Name: You have a drunk friend
About the game: The most funny Sim game this year !!! What will you play if you have a very drunk friend？A warm hearted angel?Or an evil bad guy？You may find answer in this fun sim game. Try exploring in the room and figure out how to sober up your friend,may it's not only just one solution,though,never hurt your friend,and never do evil! Key Features: Fun Dynamic Puppet Tech.,characters behave different when target/envirment changes Total random drunk behaviour,you never know what will friend act when you try a move Amazing physics simulation，high end softbody and fluid sim.The wind blow ground to dry，water will wet your body.. You can interact with almost every item,physics sim +puzzle solving We will update more contents regularly Fun,real fun!
